Definition at line 52 of file UExprMgr.h.

URef< UExprTerm > UExprMgr::ParseExpr ( const tstring &  text,
tstring &  errors 
)

attempts to parse an expression.

public method

tokenize the text.

get the error list.

return null to indicate failure.

verify that we have an expression.

store the error and return null to indicate failure.

parse the expression.

simply return the expression. Note that we don't need to store it because the parser has to create everything using the CreateX() functions in this class. That means that everything is registered at that point.
